This page covers the key points of reviewing documentation.

== Review Checklist ==

Use this review checklist in conjunction with the <nowiki>[[http://doc.ubuntu.com/styleguide/styleguide.html|Ubuntu Documentation Style Guide]]</nowiki>.

# Each DocBook file validates using <code>validate.sh</code> in SVN <code>trunk</code>
# No spelling or grammar mistakes; all text in American English
# Each section has an ID, e.g. <code><sect1 id="some-id"></code>
# Sequences of instructions are correct
** No missing steps
** Instructions apply to the current development version of Ubuntu
** Packages which are referred to exist in the Ubuntu repositories
** References to items in the user interface are correct
# All links to websites are valid
# All links to other documentation are valid

If a document does not pass all of the criteria above, please report a bug, contact the ubuntu-doc mailing list or fix the problem if you can.
